snippet: Online courses have been around for years, but now big-name colleges and competing software platforms have entered the field, which is evolving with astonishing speed.
abstract: News analysis; online college courses have been around for years, but now big-name colleges and competing software platforms are entering the field, which is evolving with astonishing speed; 12 highly ranked universities sign on with Coursera, a new venture offering free courses online.
lead_paragraph: Online courses have been around for years, but now big-name colleges and competing software platforms have entered the field, which is evolving with astonishing speed.

headline.main: Top Universities Test the Online Appeal of Free
headline.print_headline: Top Universities Test the Online Appeal of Free
